attributes.action: The government needs to take action against Knife Crime and make stronger laws.
attributes.background: Knife Crime is hitting a all-time high across the UK and it's not just a gang related issue. The government need to start taking action and enforce stronger laws against businesses and law breakers before more lives are lost.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what action you'd like the Government to take to tackle knife crime.

You may wish to sign this petition:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/210359

Alternatively, you could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
